author: EXM7777
text:
the future of agencies is SaaS (Service as a Software)...

turns out the best way to scale is to deliver your core service through software - cuts communication by 80%, makes delivery stupid simple, and somehow clients value it MORE

here's how to set this up using Whop right now:
- configure a proper onboarding sequence
- put all client resources in one whop (no more "where's that link?" emails)
- your software integrated as a whop app (feels premium, works seamlessly)
- premium custom services as upsells
- payments, communication, delivery - all in one platform

the goal is to have the whole thing feel like a product instead of a service
